movie.plot: A year after Hurricane Katrina, Al Collins, a high school basketball coach in Marrero, Louisiana, assembles a team of players who had previously attended five different schools before the disaster and leads them on the path to the state championships.

events.title: John Ehret High School win the Louisiana High School State Basketball Championship
Hurricane Katrina devastates John Ehret High School
